item.title: Barnwells Super Bowl recap: Andy Reids surprise, the real MVP and more
item.description: Andy Reid outcoached Kyle Shanahan, and Patrick Mahomes wasnt the best player on the field.

item.title: Patrick Mahomes to the rescue just in time to save Chiefs
item.description: The QB saved the day for the Chiefs much like he had all postseason long.

item.title: Falcons will not offer new deal to DE Beasley
item.description: The Atlanta Falcons will not negotiate a new deal with Vic Beasley, which will make the defensive end a free agent in March.

item.title: Jones: I feel like I could totally beat Miocic
item.description: Brimming with confidence, UFC light heavyweight champion Jon Jones says after he beats Dominick Reyes, he wants to face heavyweight champion Stipe Miocic.

item.title: Mahomes: I want to be in K.C. for a long time
item.description: Patrick Mahomes, the MVP of the Chiefs Super Bowl LIV victory over the 49ers, is eligible for a contract extension and says he wants to stay in Kansas City for a long time.

item.title: Covington wants Usman again, calls out 50 Cent
item.description: Welterweight contender Colby Covington is calling for an immediate rematch with champion Kamaru Usman.

item.title: Flyers mascot Gritty cleared of alleged assault
item.description: Gritty, the Philadelphia Flyers mascot, cleared in alleged assault of 13-year old boy at November event.

item.title: Baylor strengthens hold on No. 1 in AP Top 25
item.description: No. 1 Baylor received 49 first-place votes from the 65-member media panel in Mondays Associated Press mens college basketball poll to stay comfortably ahead of Gonzaga and Kansas.

item.title: Lowe: NBA trade talk and what might happen before the deadline
item.description: Big decisions for contenders are looming as we approach the trade deadline.

item.title: NFL Power Rankings: Way-too-early offseason poll
item.description: The Chiefs have Patrick Mahomes. The 49ers have continuity. The Patriots have Bill Belichick. Lets get optimistic about all 32 teams.

item.title: Andy Reid, finally: The NFLâ€™s most loveable coach puts bow on HOF resume
item.description: With a win over the 49ers, Andy Reid finally put an end to the questions over his big-game management -- and secured a capper on his Hall of Fame career.

item.title: Power Rankings: No. 1 seeds coming into focus
item.description: Its been a season marked by upsets, a rotation of No. 1 teams and seemingly no clear-cut favorites. But over the last few weeks, weve gotten some separation at the top of our rankings.

item.title: ESPN+ Week 14 viewers guide: Mid-majors in the spotlight
item.description: A large group of potential March bracket-busters highlight this weeks ESPN+ college basketball offerings.

item.title: UFC 246 was much more than just Conor McGregors return
item.description: McGregors stunning TKO victory over Cerrone could help shape the rest of 2020.

item.title: Can Oregon finally beat UConn in womens basketball?
item.description: With a No. 1 seed on the line, what will decide Mondays meeting? Sabrina Ionescu and Oregon look to topple UConn on the Huskies home court.

item.title: NBA Power Rankings: Can the Raptors win the East?
item.description: The Raptors have won 11 straight games and climbed to the No. 2 seed in the East, while a career week from Damian Lillard lifted the Blazers in the West.

item.title: Eric Karabells 2020 fantasy football PPR rankings
item.description: Its always fantasy football season! We have positional rankings and a top 100, which will be updated throughout the offseason.

item.title: Jon Jones on his maturity, Israel Adesanya beef and moving up to heavyweight
item.description: Jones opens up about his life in and out of the Octagon as he prepares to defend his title against Dominick Reyes.

item.title: One stat that will shape 2020 for every American League team
item.description: Baseball is a numbers game. So we dig into the stats from 2019 that will make (or break) each AL teams upcoming season.

item.title: Mookie Watch: What were hearing as Betts-to-Dodgers (or Padres) trade rumors swirl
item.description: Speculation that Bostons superstar outfielder could be headed to the West Coast is heating up.

item.title: Biggest 2020 question for each Top 25 team
item.description: Can transfer QB Jamie Newman jump-start Georgias offense? Who will play QB for Michigan? Even the best teams have questions heading into next season.

item.title: Womens Bracketology -- UConn still a No. 2 seed heading into first reveal
item.description: South Carolina, Baylor, Louisville and Oregon remain No. 1 seeds. Oregon State replaced UCLA as a 2-seed, joining UConn, NC State and Stanford.

item.title: Who are the top 16 seeds in womens basketball right now?
item.description: Before the selection committee reveals its top 16 seeds, Charlie Creme unveils the teams atop his S-curve.

item.title: Can Shrewsbury really beat Liverpools kids at Anfield?
item.description: Can Shrewsbury pull off a shock against Liverpool at Anfield? The kids will have to be ready for a determined League One outfit.

item.title: Spicy NHL storylines to watch for the rest of the season
item.description: From the Capitals goalie situation, to the Battle of Alberta, to a wild MVP race, and oh yeah, the trade deadline. Heres what were watching.

item.title: Wilder calls Fury skillful, Joshua a coward and Whyte a liar
item.description: Heavyweight titlist Deontay Wilder talks about the rematch with Tyson Fury, the top heavyweights, PEDs and his Hollywood aspirations.

item.title: Australian Open 2020: Djokovic, Kenin and the best stories from Down Under
item.description: Well, thats a wrap on the Australian Open for 2020. Here are some of the moments both on and off the court that you might have missed.

item.title: LCS and LEC League of Legends power rankings through Week 2
item.description: The second week of the LCS and LEC is about to conclude, and the top teams in each region brings some surprising additions.
